about_the_game:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to We Heist Too!

Explore the unconventional city of Rywadorium! Explore the unique regions of the city and pretend you're a regular citizen with no illegal intentions.

Prepare to enter people's homes without permission and immerse yourself into a role of a thief in a unique setting of atomic 60s fiction, at this usual day at 'work'.

This game can be perceived as a thief simulator, a stealth game, an adventure/exploration game, a puzzle game, or, perhaps, a dose of comedy! Or as a simple RPG.

Almost everything is possible in the world of We Heist Too, you just have to earn it, or use any oppurtunities for the right amount of resources and persistance! Want to fly with a glider? Sure, just buy it! Or request it as your main equipment from the black market.

Want to annoy people and be rude? Sure, just hope the police and genius robots won't be on your tail after someone's ego is hurt.

Everything you see might be of use to you, many things in We Heist Too are interactable. Though, some things work AGAINST you, and some might work FOR you, who knows really? But in any case - it's important to explore your surroundings, it will likely help you a lot.

You are the one to decide how you operate, you decide how you talk to citizens and if you need their help, you also decide whether you use your intelligence to solve tasks and rob a home without ever being seen, or your bravery to ram through it all - guns blazing.

Remember, you ARE a thief here, getting caught will have a set of consequences and might put your freedom at risk.

Visit shops, gas stations, workshops and find anything that can be of help to you, to be as effective and powerful as possible... and yes, that would come at a price, but i am sure that won't be a problem for you, who works in such a prestige job, right?

And don't forget to talk with your partner in crime - Bernard Maidenhoff, he has some knowledge to throw at you... at days he doesn't feel like being stingy or nitpicky of you ha-ha!

Just don't forget to use everything you have and can get to become a successful thief and make a fortune that will leave you bathing in gold.

Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: We Heist Too contains gameplay directly releated to theft and disobeying police orders. Vandalism, roofing, black market selling and such illegal actions are also present.
